page.title: 11DAY IN THE LIFE OF K.LEDBURY
page.content: On{Thursday the 18th of July 1985}my alarm rang at{7.15am,}I got up, got dressed into my{school uniform}which is blue, I then went down stairs for my{breakfast}of toast. I got ready for{school}and at{8.00am}I left the house. I went to catch the {school bus,}this came at{8.30am.}I arrived at school at{8.50am.}School started,my first{lesson}was{Physics, followed by{break}I then had{Geography at{12.15pm}it was{lunch}time. I had {sausages, chips and tomato sauce.} After lunch I had{Maths}followed by {English.}At{3.50pm}school ended and I caught the bus home arriving back at {4.10.}At{5.40pm}my family and I had our{evening meal}which was a{roast {dinner.}After tea I watched{T.V,}then at{10.00pm}I went to{bed. Karen Ledbury.
